name: Arah-Aka
description:
Sun Blessed Sands
The Arah-Aka are an isolationist culture who often live in harsh, desert environments. They are a group that values beauty and tradition above all else, often expressing their artistic craft in the creation of beautiful glass sculptures and even weapons.

options.name: Ritual Dagger
options.description: You perform the ultimate offense in the Arah-Ka culture and make an Attack with a Light 1-Handed Piercing Weapon made of glass, causing the Target to gain the Bleeding Condition. Add an additional 1d10 Damage to any Physical Damage you do while the Target has the Bleeding Condition on it.

options.name: Artistic Expression
options.description: Gain +1 Expression and your beautiful glass creations are worth 25% more when sold to merchants.

options.name: Desert Scholar
options.description: Gain +1 Academics and you can read the stars to never get lost in the desert.
